description: This is a market on the final sale price that will be realized for FEWOCiOUS’s “His Name Is Victor” (Lot 4), to be auctioned at Christie’s “Hello, I'm Victor (FEWOCiOUS) and This Is My Life”. This is an online auction, where bidding is scheduled to start on June 23, 2021, 10:00 AM ET and end on June 30, 2021, 2:00 PM ET (https://onlineonly.christies.com/s/hello-im-victor-fewocious-my-life/fewocious-b-2003-4/123239). This market will resolve to “Yes” if, after bidding has closed, Christie’s lists that the “Price Realised” for the piece is higher than $500,000. This market will resolve to “No”, if after bidding has closed, the “Price Realised” for the piece is equal to or lower than $500,000. Note, as this is an online auction, this is not a market on the final hammer price of the auction, but rather the price realised, which includes the winning bid price and other premiums and fees. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Will FEWOCiOUS’s “His Name Is Victor” have a final sale price of more than $500K at Christie’s?
